thread.title: Popovich to coach US Olympic basketball team after Coach K
thread.title_full: Popovich to coach US Olympic basketball team after Coach K

title: Popovich to coach US Olympic basketball team after Coach K
text: > Texas Popovich to coach US Olympic basketball team after Coach K FILE - This is a March 8, 2015, file photo showing San Antonio Spurs head coach Gregg Popovich watching play during the first half of an NBA basketball game against the Chicago Bulls in San Antonio. Popovich, who has led the San Antonio Spurs to five NBA titles, will replace Mike Krzyzewski as the U.S. basketball coach following the 2016 Olympics. (AP Photo/Darren Abate, File)
